input.sentences: we started our trip by visiting the local public market looking for bargains .
the city was beautiful and we wanted to see as many sites as we could before leaving .
the downtown area had many tall buildings beautifully constructed .
we had a wonderful dinner at one of the best restaurants in town .
we had some drinks at the local pub after dinner to relax .
output.sentences: There was a beautiful sign on a building in the city, it read "public market"
The sky behind was grey and ominous looking
But towards the east the sun was shining behind the sky scraper
We sat by the window and looked out at the stret
Where we sat was warm and inviting which was a relief from the grey outside.
